name: Abysia Archive
description:
A short side scroller based on my ongoing series. Play as the rescue operative, Veronica, as she dives into a precarious system of cliffs in order to find a missing survey team.  The game is around five minutes and was made for a game art class so it is a tad wonky, but hope you enjoy it!

Controls:

Move ---- Left & Right

Attack--- A

Jump---W

Magic---D

Advance Text---Spacebar

Pause---Q

Toggle Fullscreen---ESC
